title: Sterlite Power acquires Neemrana II Kotputli Transmission
description: "Enabling part of 7.7 GW of green power flow, the Neemrana II Kotputli Transmission project is another vital cog in the machine that will accelerate the nation's transition to a sustainable future," Sterlite Power Managing Director Pratik Agarwal said in the statement.
